module.name: themeinstallator
module.description: Export or Install a theme and its modules on your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Export or Install a theme and its modules on your shop.

module.name: socolissimo
module.description: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and Belgium
module.author: Quadra Informatique
module.description_full: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and Belgium. 48h delivery service to home addresses or collection points.
module.additional_description: A free solution with no need for development, easy to install from your Prestashop back-office.An "iframe" delivery page that is consistent with the site, thus ensuring continuity in the buying process.A wide range of shipping methods to meet the needs of your e-buyers.Increased revenue through the Colissimo service to BelgiumAccess to a dedicated customer area in the "Colissimo Box" and a tracking tool for your shipments: ColiView.A mobile version of the module to ensure compatibility and consistent sales throughout the day. This module will help you generate additional sales thanks to your multichannel presence.NB: This module is for traders with a SIRET French business identification number.

module.name: hipay
module.description: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system. You can access all international and local payment solutions (Visa, MasterCard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: paypal
module.description: Please your customers with one of the best payment solutions. With over 143 million active accounts worldwide, PayPal is a leader in payment solutions on web and mobile
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Please your customers with one of the best payment solutions. With over 143 million active accounts worldwide, PayPal is a leader in payment solutions on web and mobile. Available in 193 countries in 26 currencies, PayPal is also one of the most recognised and trusted online payment solutions by the customers

module.name: mondialrelay
module.description: The Mondial Relay module developed with Prestashop allows stores to use the deliveries by Point Relais® (over 6300 traders proximity) and at home in France and Europe
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Mondial Relay module developed with Prestashop allows stores to use the deliveries by Point Relais® (over 6300 traders proximity) and at home in France and Europe. Mondial Relay shares his expertise with all merchants, regardless of their level of activity, proposing an offer without prerequisites of parcels quantity, without commitment period and no management fees or subscription.
module.additional_description: With this module, you will have a wider choice of delivery modes, your customers will appreciate the ability to be delivered by Point Relais® which you will improve your conversion rate.

module.name: envoimoinscher
module.description: Find the best price for your shipment. Compare and order carriers offers at negotiated rates
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Find the best price for your shipment. Compare and order carriers offers at negotiated rates.

module.description: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone&n
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone
module.additional_description: There are many ways your business benefits from choosing Ingenico ePayments as its payments partner : We process and secure internet payments. Whether you have an online or mobile webshop, or take orders by phone, we'll help you accept payments, receive funds, and protect your business from fraudsters.

module.name: fianetfraud
module.description: With Certissim, secure your sales and control your outstanding payments ! E-merchants, you are the first victims of Internet fraud. Fraud transactions are the source of financial losses
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With Certissim, secure your sales and control your outstanding payments ! E-merchants, you are the first victims of Internet fraud. Fraud transactions are the source of financial losses. Enjoy the power of Certissim system: 3.5 billion euros in revenue and 20 million transactions analyzed in 2010. *
module.additional_description: Your shop is version 1.5 or 1.6? This module is already pre-installed and ready for use! To activate it, go to the "Modules" tab in your back office and click Install. This module is available for France.

module.name: fianetsceau
module.displayName: Avis FIA-NET – Le Sceau de Confiance FIA-NET
module.description: With the FIA-NET Sceau de Confiance, turn your visitors into buyers! Be transparent to users by highlighting the quality of your service. The principle is simple: your customers evaluate you
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With the FIA-NET Sceau de Confiance, turn your visitors into buyers! Be transparent to users by highlighting the quality of your service. The principle is simple: your customers evaluate you. Over 15 million reviews collected already! *
module.additional_description: Your shop is version 1.5 or 1.6? This module is already pre-installed and ready for use! To activate it, go to the "Modules" tab in your back office and click Install. This module is available for France.

module.name: twenga
module.displayName: Advanced traffic acquisition on the Twenga network
module.description: Integrate your product feed onto the Twenga search engine, as well as on over 1,500 partner sites, thanks to Smart LEADS by Twenga Solutions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integrate your product feed onto the Twenga search engine, as well as on over 1,500 partner sites, thanks to Smart LEADS by Twenga Solutions.
module.additional_description: Smart LEADS is a completely automated qualified traffic acquisition solution, which is aimed at e-retailers of all sizes. It generates visibility and optimises advertising campaign performance, in real-time, within the Twenga network. This network includes Twenga's shopping engine websites and over 1,500 international partner sites including price comparison sites, shopping guides and editorial sites. About Smart LEADS: Smart LEADS analyses product performance using many different indicators (conversions, average spend, best selling products...).Customer profiling based on 40 different factors (search history, customer type, location, time...)Calculate buyers' affinity with your products.Rank products according to performance criteria and affinity, and push those with the highest probability of generating sales. This logic is applied, in real-time, for each product display on the Twenga network. Increase sales and improve revenue with a unique solution! 2* ConversionTarget highly qualified users and audiences3* ClientsSignificantly increase your sales and client base6* RevenueOptimise your cost per acquisition objectives at the finest level

module.name: ebay
module.description: Easily export your products from PrestaShop to eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, to win new customers and help accelerate your sales
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Easily export your products from PrestaShop to eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, to win new customers and help accelerate your sales. Duplicate your online store to your eBay store, directly from your PrestaShop Back Office !
module.additional_description: Duplicate your PrestaShop online store to your eBay store, directly from your administration pannelDevelop a profitable sales channel using eBay as a new route to marketReach a global audience of over a hundred million potential buyersCreate listings and sell across both channels from 1 dashboardManage your orders across all channels and prevent over-selling

module.name: ganalytics
module.description: Your customers go everywhere; shouldn't your analytics? Google Analytics shows you the full customer picture across ads and videos, websites and social tools, tablets and smartphones
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your customers go everywhere; shouldn't your analytics? Google Analytics shows you the full customer picture across ads and videos, websites and social tools, tablets and smartphones. That makes it easier to serve your current customers and win new ones.
module.additional_description: An ad click here, a page view there, a video watched on a tablet before bed... but which one clinched the sale? Google Analytics has the latest in full-credit measurement, so you see all the stops people take on the road to action. The result: a measurable way to improve campaigns and reach new audiences as they go through their days.

module.name: shoppingfluxexport
module.description: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines.
module.additional_description: Sell your products List on Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping, Bing Ads, 11 Main, Rakuten, eBay Commerce Network, shopping.com, Shopzilla, PriceGrabber, and more than 1000 other sales channels internationally. Enhance Your Data Our DataFix Toolbox easily patches holes in your product data that would otherwise prevent you from listing and selling your products on a sales channel. Never Pay for Setup Shopping Feed's Automated setup gets you up and running on your favorite sales channels in a flash. Our dedicated support team will make sure you get connected, no matter how complicated the setup.

module.name: avalaratax
module.description: Overview Avalara AvaTax provides the fastest, easiest, most accurate and affordable way to calculate sales tax within PrestaShop, manage exemption certificates, file returns, and remit payments across
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Overview Avalara AvaTax provides the fastest, easiest, most accurate and affordable way to calculate sales tax within PrestaShop, manage exemption certificates, file returns, and remit payments across multiple tax regions.
module.additional_description: AvaTax calculates accurate sales tax based on geo-spatial mapping.Your data is seamlessly integrated with PrestaShop.Tax reports at your fingertips, including tax returns and audits.Stress free returns processing. Your filing is done on time, every time. Guaranteed.For as little as $5/month!Get started today!  http://www.avalara.com/integrations/prestashop/

module.additional_description: Enjoy the benefits of version 1.6 of PrestaShop in one click with this module that allows you to update easily your online store!

module.name: payulatam

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayU Latam is the leading online payment service provider in Latin America with more than 20,000 clients. PayU Latam’s multi-language and multi-currency platform has the most complete anti-fraud system in the region. The 70+ payment options allows its clients to reach the entire market with cash deposits, bank transfers, and local and international credit cards in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Mexico, Panama and Peru.

module.name: yotpo
module.description: Trusted by over 150,000 merchants, Yotpo helps you generate reviews and use them to drive qualified traffic and more sales. Yotpo’s core product is available free of charge
module.author: Community developer

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer. Google and PrestaShop increase your advertising investment by offering £75 after the first spent £25  (or 75€ for 25€ if you are not based in the UK) !  Download the module to get your promotional code and start your campaign now !
module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google AdWords, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers. To help you get started, we've partnered with Google to give you £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign.  Receive £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign. Or call 08001690713

module.name: firstdata
module.description: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿!   Fast. Secure. Reliable
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿!   Fast. Secure. Reliable. PrestaShop and First Data have teamed up as industry leaders to help your business save money in online payment acceptance. With over 40 years of payment processing experience, Express Merchant Processing Solutions (EMPS) — powered by First Data has helped millions of businesses like yours bring fast, secure, effortless payments to their customers and affordable support—regardless of size.

module.author: SendinBlue

module.name: payplug

module.author: PrestaShop Partners

Thanks to PayPlug, you can simplify your online payments and no longer lose out on sales:Quick payment without registrationModern and sleek designAutomatic detection of card type

module.name: realexredirect

module.author: Coccinet

module.additional_description: Conversion rate Optimise the purchasing funnel   Productivity Improve your website securityOur payment page seamlessly drives your customer to easily make payments online.We ensure you offer the perfect combination of payment methods to your customers allowing you to maximise online sales for your business. We deliver a fully customisable payment experience that integrates with your brand and is supported by our powerful technology.Our commitment to innovation ensures you have access to the latest payment technologiesOur payment solution includes 30+ fraud checks & 3D secure authentication.

module.description_full: Enables you to enter the intra-community VAT number when creating the address. You must fill in the company field to allow entering the VAT number.

module.name: simplifycommerce
module.description: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution, features a low, flat rate with no extra fees, two-day funding and major brand acceptance. Sign up takes minutes
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution, features a low, flat rate with no extra fees, two-day funding and major brand acceptance. Sign up takes minutes. With easy PrestaShop installation, your business can start selling right away.
module.additional_description: Built by MasterCard, a global leader in the payment industry, our merchants benefit from:Fast merchant signup in minutesSimple, flat 2.85% + 30₵ rate provided by acquirer with no hidden feesOmni-channel payment solution for website, mobile and eCommerce storeAccepting major card brandsQuick two-day fundingHighest Level 1 PCI certification

module.name: boxdropshipment
module.description: You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office.﻿
module.additional_description: Stop loosing time with the shipment handling in your shop with boxdrop® eLogistics (transport and delivery)﻿.﻿ boxdrop® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office - adds a fully integrated shipment subsystem to your PrestaShop for free. Simply group your goods into parcels and generate shipment documents and a pickup request with a single click. To ensure a safe and fast delivery, all shipments are being handled by DHL, the world leader in logistic. No need for a lengthy sign-up process with sales representatives, simply create a boxdrop account and you are good to go.

module.name: cronjobs
module.description: Manage all your automated web tasks from a single interface
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Manage all your automated web tasks from a single interface.

module.name: veplatform
module.displayName: VePlatform: Increase conversions from abandoned carts
module.description: Increase your sales by adding the VePlatform’s integrated remarketing and re-engagement apps that convert customers who abandon your site
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase your sales by adding the VePlatform’s integrated remarketing and re-engagement apps that convert customers who abandon your site.  Get connected to the VePlatform now!
module.additional_description: Gain access to 4 marketing apps that generate sales for tens of thousands of happy customers worldwide   On average we can help your business generate up to 40% in new sales per month. Website abandonment and cart abandonment are responsible for businesses only achieving up to 30% of their potential sales. 70% or 3 in 4 potential customers place your products in their basket and then abandon. VePlatform tracks all of your customers across your site and lets you deploy a series of Apps designed to win those customers back.   You can trust our apps to:Find you new customersRetarget lost customersIncrease your online revenueIncrease customer time on your site

module.name: vtpayment
module.description: VTPayment creates payment addons for PrestaShop to help merchants accept payments from more than 3.5 billion UnionPay cardholders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: VTPayment creates payment addons for PrestaShop to help merchants accept payments from more than 3.5 billion UnionPay cardholders. We are honored to provide addons to PrestaShop merchants with 11+ transaction currencies for options.
module.additional_description: Merchant could accept payments from more than 3.5 billion UnionPay cardholders, and this number is still increasing from time to time.Support multiple currencies for website pricing, and get all payment in 4 major currencies within only 2 business days for fast payout.Security, Satiability and Easy Management.Participate and enjoy various marketing events and activities to all Chinese under UnionPay family.Could register for a live account with few minutes, by updating account could upgrade account level and get to launch quickly.

module.name: yousticeresolutionsystem
module.description: Youstice is a customer service tool. It helps retailers to process all claims and resolve them quickly and efficiently
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Youstice is a customer service tool. It helps retailers to process all claims and resolve them quickly and efficiently. This module integrates Youstice in your online store, making it easy to use by customers who want to complain about a service or a product.  Youstice plugin is only available for French Merchants
module.additional_description: From November, companies will be able to acquire the new Customer satisfaction management package, which includes the Youstice module, as well as protection against cost of unresolved disputes that customers might escalate to ODR (online dispute resolution) bodies. The package, offered jointly by Youstice in cooperation with AXA Protection Juridique and Prestashop meets the requirements of the  new French law on consumer disputes, while optimizing the budget of your customer service. For more information, check www.youstice.com/fr/lepack The package is only available for French companies.  Advantages: - Youstice`s customer service module plus coverage against legal disputes - Compliant with the new French consumer law - Free Trial-Period (45 days), without risk

module.name: klikandpay
module.description: Klik & Pay is a holistic secured payment solution accessible via PC, tablets and/or smartphone
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klik & Pay is a holistic secured payment solution accessible via PC, tablets and/or smartphone. Partners with many Banks and International acquirers, Klik & Pay assists its merchants for 15 years, in France, Europe and all over the World. Whatever your industry, we have a solution for you:
module.additional_description: No start-up fees or monthly subscriptionOnly 1.45% and 0.3 € per transactionA team available to help you secure your transactions and increase your conversion rate.

module.name: dpdpoland
module.description: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop
module.author: Invertus
module.description_full: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop. All necessary tools for preparation and tracking of parcels have been consolidated and can be managed from one single interface. DPD Poland offers the highest quality of services, which will contribute to your clients’ satisfaction. The DPD official module enables complete shipment management, allowing you to easily prepare the necessary shipment documents and tracking your parcel.
module.additional_description: Once the module has been installed and configured, the user will gain access to important features for the easy handling and sending parcels.

module.name: erpillicopresta
module.description: Save time on e-shop management with the 1st free and adaptable ERP: Client orders, Shipping, Suppliers, Stock management and export, Inventory, and more
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Save time on e-shop management with the 1st free and adaptable ERP: Client orders, Shipping, Suppliers, Stock management and export, Inventory, and more.
module.additional_description: When it comes to added professionalism for the management of your client and supplier orders, advanced configuration of your supplier forms, or even managing and exporting your stock and running your inventory, the 1-Click ERP pack will be your preferred assistant to help you manage your store in a simple, efficient way! Managing your back-office will no longer be a problem! The 1-Click ERP pack will save you precious time in managing your e-commerce: Up to 2h per day, according to the merchants who use it!

module.name: nostotagging
module.displayName: Nosto - The Complete Personalization Solution for PrestaShop
module.description: Nosto harnesses big data to build a deep understanding of every customer in real-time, automatically predicting and delivering the most relevant shopping experiences wherever your customers are
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Nosto harnesses big data to build a deep understanding of every customer in real-time, automatically predicting and delivering the most relevant shopping experiences wherever your customers are.
module.additional_description: Increase customer lifetime value, average order value and conversion by personalizing the whole funnel:Acquire - Drive qualified traffic to your storeConvert - Encourage hesitant shoppers to continue to the checkoutRetain - Produce loyal customers and inspire return visits to your storeOptimize - Have full control to continually improve performance...all the personalization tools you need in one solution. Pay only a small % of the revenue Nosto helps you generate!

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Dotpay enables fast and handy Internet payments accepting for sellers in e-shop based on PrestaShop. Start your account and see how much you may earn accepting payments online via Dotpay!
module.additional_description: Cooperation between Dotpay and PrestaShop is an answer for sellers needs who minimalizing efforts want to increase their selling opportunities. The possibilities offered by PrestaShop are not limited only to basic Internet shop functions. They offer many more - versatile offer of developing an offer, sales analyses, banner systems applying and comments, RSS channels or goods comparison. A useful functionality is individual creation of graphics changing this way the e-shop looks. What is more, the program may be developed by external modules.

module.name: sarbacanedesktop
module.description: Go to the module to start your campaign and benefit from 500 free credits ! Easily create and send stunning newsletters to inform your community and increase customer loyalty
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Go to the module to start your campaign and benefit from 500 free credits ! Easily create and send stunning newsletters to inform your community and increase customer loyalty. The module synchronizes your PrestaShop store and your Sarbacane Desktop emailing software.
module.additional_description: Support:  multilingual technical support available to help you - phone and emailmany online resourcesvideos, tutorials, guides, tips ...  Easy: Simply create beautiful responsive newsletters thanks to the EmailBuilderOptimal deliverability: Your customers really receive your emailsAdvanced Features: targeting, segmentation, Split test...

module.name: reforestaction
module.description: Adopt an ecofriendly image and optimize your online reputation for free: give your customers the opportunity to plant a tree for €1 when purchasing on your shop
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Adopt an ecofriendly image and optimize your online reputation for free: give your customers the opportunity to plant a tree for €1 when purchasing on your shop.
module.additional_description: With the module Responsible Purchase by Reforest' Action, your customers can plant a tree in the world to compensate the CO2 emissions of their purchase. Thanks to you, they act for the planet and they let it know on Facebook and Twitter. So you get better visibility on the Internet, free of charge.

module.name: expressmailing
module.description: First Marketing & Newsletter module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including emailing with 9,000 free emails per month i.e
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: First Marketing & Newsletter module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including emailing with 9,000 free emails per month i.e. 300 per day, and the possibility to send FAX and SMS at very low prices.
module.additional_description: With more than 13 years of experience in direct marketing, we provide the ideal tool to broadcast your marketing campaigns (emailing, faxing & Sms). Fully integrated with PrestaShop Express-Mailing module allows you to precisely select recipients of the campaigns from your PrestaShop customers or visitors by using various filters. You can easily send them newsletters, discounts or special offers, report your season sales or announce your corporate events. Quick and intuitive, you can send your email campaigns to 200 or even 10 000 contacts in less than 5 minutes. Experience the Express-Mailing module now, and boost your sales !

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop. Not only are the different delivery methods (to home or office location, to a parcel locker or a postal point) immediately available in your shop, you can also manage most of the settings directly via the Prestashop backend, print the labels and access the Track & Trace. The add-on is free of charge, still a contract with bpost should be signed in order to have access to the bpost logistical solutions.
module.additional_description: -       Easy set-up, plug & play -       Responsive design -       All bpost delivery methods are immediately available:@home@bpostParcels lockerInternational-       Configure prices per delivery method, independently and directly in the module -       Use most common options for your sendings (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation) -       Print directly from the backend -       Track & Trace your parcels from the backend

module.name: prestashopovhhosting
module.description: Your online store is too slow? OVH offers hosting solutions optimized for the needs of a prestashop store with free installation and support 24/7
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your online store is too slow? OVH offers hosting solutions optimized for the needs of a prestashop store with free installation and support 24/7.

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: Use the DPD France module to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home addresses, business addresses, etc. Enjoy an automated system for managing back-office orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Use the DPD France module to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home addresses, business addresses, etc. Enjoy an automated system for managing back-office orders. Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: mercadopagobr
module.description: MercadoPago payment module: receive payments with a customizable and standard checkout, and bar code payment
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: MercadoPago payment module: receive payments with a customizable and standard checkout, and bar code payment. MercadoPago provide the highest security standard with PCI Level 1 certification and an internal robust fraud analysis. With MercadoPago, you can accept major credit card brands, offer installments options and receive all funds upfront, and allow consumers to pay in websites or mobiles. Credit Card Customized Checkout: this feature will allow merchants to have a customized checkout for credit card payment. Thus, it will be possible to customize its look and feel, customers won’t be redirected away to complete the payment, and it will also reduce the checkout steps improving conversion rate. Customized Bar Code Payment: this feature will allow merchants to have a customized bar code payment. It reduces the checkout steps improving conversion rates. The bar code payment can be also customized with the merchant's logo. Standard checkout: this feature will allow merchants to have a standard checkout. It includes all payment methods (i.e. all credit cards, bar code payment, account money) and all window types (i.e. redirect, iframe and modal). Customization is not possible for this type of checkout. Sign up here!
module.additional_description: MercadoPago can help Prestashop’s merchants increase their sales with its cutting edge payment technology, providing solutions that fit with the clients’ needs:  - Online and real-time payment processing- High approval rate through an internal robust fraud analyses - High conversion with our customized checkout- Customizable bar code payment - Potential new consumers due to our large user base – 120 million in Latin America- Highest Level 1 PCI certification- Major credit card brands acceptance- Payment in installments- Two-day or fourteen day funding*- Omni-channel payment system for website and mobiles- One-click to pay with MercadoPago’s standard checkout- Sellers protection program*- Easy to install module  * According to MercadoPago’s terms and conditions.

module.name: chronopost
module.description: Offer the services of the leading express shipper to individuals in France! Offer the choice and flexibility of multi-choice delivery: ship to a home, a pickup point, or an office!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Offer the services of the leading express shipper to individuals in France! Offer the choice and flexibility of multi-choice delivery: ship to a home, a pickup point, or an office!
module.additional_description: Choose the carrier that delivers more than 80 million packages per year and serves 230 countries.Save time with simplified managementGet real-time tracking of your shipments

module.name: dpdgroup
module.description: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop
module.author: Invertus
module.description_full: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop. All necessary tools for preparation and tracking of parcels have been consolidated and can be managed from one single interface.
module.additional_description: Once the module has been installed and configured, the user gains access to functionalities which make shipment management easy. This solution will help optimize and automatize the shop’s performance when it comes to handling and sending parcels, including:  printing of waybills (label, delivery of goods protocol)ordering courierstracking your parcelsviewing shipment history

module.name: zeleriscarrier
module.description: The Zeleris PrestaShop extension integrates Zeleris as a shipping provider for the online store. The extension allows direct integration of shipping orders into Zeleris Transportation System
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Zeleris PrestaShop extension integrates Zeleris as a shipping provider for the online store. The extension allows direct integration of shipping orders into Zeleris Transportation System.
module.additional_description: The Zeleris PrestaShop module allows quick and simple integration of the online store with Zeleris Transportation System. The module also adds many features that simplify the management of transport within the online store. Zeleris (Telefónica Servicios Integrales de Distribución, S.A.U.), is a Telefónica Group company specialized in the provision of logistics and domestic and international transportation services both for individuals and businesses. Zeleris has a customer base that includes several of the most important companies in Spain in the fields of e-commerce and distance selling and is the main logistics supplier for Telefonica Group in Spain.

module.name: nimblepayment
module.description: Nimble Payments is an online financial solution offered by BBVA that enables you to accept payments in your store in a fully secure manner
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Nimble Payments is an online financial solution offered by BBVA that enables you to accept payments in your store in a fully secure manner. Easily integrated, it offers added-value services for business management such as integrated financial solutions and qualified customer care in Spanish. This module has been updated with the new Redsys signature system (HMAC SHA-256).
module.additional_description: Simple installation and configuration: you can integrate the Nimble Payments into your PrestaShop yourself; and within a few minutes you will be able to accept transactions while relying on security offered by BBVA. And if you have any questions, you can contact the free technical assistance and rely on a qualified team in Spain. Guaranteed by PrestaShop: guaranteed compatibility with all PrestaShop versions and updates.  Simple pricing system: a percentage on the sale with no fixed amount. The higher your monthly revenue, the lower your monthly fee could be. Maximum security which meets security standards and ensures secure transactions for both you and your customers.

module.name: protectedshops
module.description: Automatically protected against legal proceedings with the AGB Connect ® module Protected Shops offers an online service for creation of legal texts like terms and conditions, imprint, privacy po
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Automatically protected against legal proceedings with the AGB Connect ® module Protected Shops offers an online service for creation of legal texts like terms and conditions, imprint, privacy policy and many more. Automatic update.  2 months for free for PrestaShop users!
module.additional_description: Individual legal texts through questionnaires creation The survey considers the characteristics of the different countries, payment procedures, logistic providers, tracking solutions, social networks and can easily generate the legal texts for nearly every individual business model legally correct.   Automatic update when new laws or court decisions become effective The maintenance happens independently from the online traders. The module synchronizes the legal texts regularly with the servers of Protected Shops and cares for the actuality of the legal texts. The trader can decide which documents he wants to use and the frequency of the updating can be determined by the customer himself. The update is necessary when new laws or court decisions become effective, so that the online shop is always up to date. At that point, online traders are protected against legal proceedings.

module.name: famebitconnectingbrandstoyoutubeinfluencers
module.displayName: FameBit - Connecting Brands to YouTube Influencers
module.description: FameBit is the first and largest marketplace for connecting brands with YouTubers across the world for product endorsements
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: FameBit is the first and largest marketplace for connecting brands with YouTubers across the world for product endorsements. FameBit brings YouTube creators to you making it easy to work with the most influential content creators on YouTube. Drive brand awareness, increase purchase intent, and trend with the next generation of consumers through creative content they trust.
module.additional_description: The easiest and quickest way to connect with social media influencers and stars. It's completely free to post a campaign and start receiving proposals from influencers that want to work with your brand. Best yet interested YouTubers come to you saving you a ton of time and unanswered emails.

module.name: shiptomyid
module.description: Ship2MyID allows shipping without an address. Generate new transactions that were not possible before. Enable REAL gifting by delivering gifts to cell numbers, or emails, social ID of the receiver
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ship2MyID allows shipping without an address. Generate new transactions that were not possible before. Enable REAL gifting by delivering gifts to cell numbers, or emails, social ID of the receiver.  A PrestaShop store will increase consumer’s ability to send gifts up to 98%, and speed up mobile checkout by 75x.

module.name: lendingclub
module.description: Lending Club is the world’s largest online marketplace connecting borrowers and investors
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Lending Club is the world’s largest online marketplace connecting borrowers and investors. Fast, affordable business loans for working capital or expansion purposes
module.additional_description: Lending Club gives small business owners access to affordable credit.  Business loans up to $300,000 with annual interest rates ranging from 5.9 to 25.9%.  Flexible 1 to 5 year terms and fixed monthly payments for more control of your cash flow

module.name: mobfirst
module.displayName: MobFirst - Native Mobile Apps to your PrestaShop
module.description: Best mobile solution for your store. The most complete iPhone and Android apps published for Prestashop. Automatically integrated by the click of a button
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Best mobile solution for your store. The most complete iPhone and Android apps published for Prestashop. Automatically integrated by the click of a button. We built beautiful, easy-to-use, mobile commerce apps for your PrestaShop store.
module.additional_description: Always with your client: Being constantly in touch with your customers through mobile apps has become increasingly common for companies who want to build customer loyalty.With you apps, customers can be directly activated at any time through PUSH notifications. Tell them about your new products, promos and campaigns. Make them loyal customers. Higher Conversion Rates: Apps have an average 40% greater conversion rate compared to responsive websites. Don’t miss any sales, use your full revenue potential. Branding: Having an app is more than just sales, it’s a statement of your commitment, quality and care for all of your customers. The largest ecommerces already know it, and now it’s your chance of having an exclusive app for your store. Fast support: 100% of our customers get an answer within 24 hours (workdays) to help you as quickly as possible get your apps published. Pricing: For only $149/month you will have your own app, customized according to your visual identity and fully integrated with you PrestaShop store.

module.name: securitypatch
module.description: This module improves your shop's safety by applying the latest security patches from PrestaShop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module improves your shop's safety by applying the latest security patches from PrestaShop.

module.name: mediafinanz
module.description: Your customer is not paying? This free-of-charge mediafinanz module will enable you to transfer outstanding claims from your order overview to the collection experts for further processing
module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: Your customer is not paying? This free-of-charge mediafinanz module will enable you to transfer outstanding claims from your order overview to the collection experts for further processing. You will manage and control your claims from your back office.
module.additional_description: YOUR ADVANTAGES A free-of-charge collection module for your PrestaShopMore resources for your core businessHigher realisation rates by means of long-term experience in online collectionMaintenance of your long-term customer relationsOutstanding IT and data securityProfessional, personal adviceStaff with sound legal experience The outsourcing of the extra-judicial collection of your outstanding claims will save your time and valuable internal resources. Our processes are fully automated and based on state of the art software technology with high data security. The TÜV-certified collection solution, which does not involve any cost risk, can be optimally integrated into your existing shop work flow. mediafinanz does not just think of itself as a collection agent for you, but as your active companion. Our approach is designed to achieve settlement by agreement. We strive to find solutions acceptable to both parties, to ensure existing customer relations are not prejudiced, and to collect receivables at an early stage of the collection management. NO COST RISKMembership not requiredNo basic subscriptionNo lump sum payment on non-collectable itemsNo success based fees Button to the registration module Register now free-of-charge! More than 25,000 clients rely on us. Why not experience a new kind of freedom as well!

module.name: creditfr
module.description: You are entrepreneur, craftsman or merchant and you have development projects for your organization ? Looking for alternatives and affordable financing?
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: You are entrepreneur, craftsman or merchant and you have development projects for your organization ? Looking for alternatives and affordable financing?
module.additional_description: Borrow directly from individuals at competitive rates Thanks to a new type of financing without any bank ! Enjoy a quick and easy credit, seamlessly You make an online request to immediately know your eligibility to our financing offer. You get a response within 48 hours. You know exactly how many fees you will pay and you can follow your transaction 100% online via your customer space on Credit.fr Finance all your development projects With Credit.fr, you can finance different kind of projects:Any type of material (Computer Telephony, Medical Office, Medical,)Machine & ToolIntangible / WebsiteTourism / Utility / Industrial VehicleWorks / Facilities / Real EstateBusiness Takeover (the target must be over 4 years)Franchise / Admission Feed (franchisor of over 4 years)Research & DevelopmentBuyout of Partners Current Accounts

module.name: oneandonehosting
module.description: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA.  Please click here to benefit from the UK special offer and here if you are based in Canada
module.additional_description: Further advantages you can benefit from with 1&1 New Hosting:Choose from 40 Click & Build Apps including PrestaShop1&1 Expert App Support available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week – with advice and practical help specific to the application you’re usingMaximum availability thanks to the geo-redundant hosting of your website in two geographically separate data centres1&1 SiteLock included, keeping your website virus-freeGuaranteed performance from 2 GB RAM (with the 1&1 Unlimited Plus package) Domain included free with select packages (.co.uk, .com, .net, .org, .me.uk or .org.uk)Unlimited power: Unlimited webspace, traffic, and MySQL databases

module.name: checkyourdata
module.description: Unlock the power of your Google Analytics with the most advanced tracking method: 100% reliable sales data
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Unlock the power of your Google Analytics with the most advanced tracking method: 100% reliable sales data. Benefit from a Certified Google Analytics Technology Partner module and GET YOUR 30-DAY FREE TRIAL
module.additional_description: Install Google Analytics For Ecommerce in less than 5 minutes, without hiring a tech guy to help you. We have just automated the whole process. So let’s have a coffee!Benefit from the most advanced technologies regarding data tracking and analytics in 1 click.Get the best of you Analytics with 100% reliable data thanks to our homemade tracking code !Analyze you data in a second with clean Ecommerce dashboards and conversion funnelMeasure the real return on your marketing investment

module.name: alipay
module.displayName: Alipay Official - the leading ePayment solution for China
module.description: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions. It is a secure and convenient solution and preferred by over 400 million active members.
module.additional_description: What is Alipay? Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading third-party online payment solution for China. The significantly growing interest by Chinese shoppers in Western brands create large opportunities for Western companies with 67% of Chinese luxury spending occurring outside Chinese borders. If you are offering maternity products, food supplements, fashion, beauty or jewellery, Alipay will create an astonishing opportunity for you, opening up the Chinese market.

module.name: safeshops
module.description: With a SafeShops Label you will fully comply with Belgian and European law
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With a SafeShops Label you will fully comply with Belgian and European law. After filling in a questionnaire with tips, an independent law firm will lead you through the legal jungle and provide you with the necessary documents like general conditions, privacy/cookie policies. So, join the fastest growing label community of Belgium and enhance trust in your online sales.
module.additional_description: Why choose this service?   °Boost your customer relations °Enhance trust °Alleviate customer disputes   Choose the SafeShops Label and:   ° Promote confidence in your webshop ° Take advantage of personal legal support ° Receive e-commerce general conditions and standard documents in 4 languages. ° Increase your cross-border sales with the Emota Label ° Be part of a very dynamic e-community ° Take part in the 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights (www.shoppingnights.be) ° Avoid fines and complaints.   Choose the SafeShops Label and avoid extra legal costs.   Webshops have to comply with manifold legislation.  European, local and sector bound legislation will vary…   This is the reason why Prestashop collaborates with SafeShops.  SafeShops  will  give you legal advise by setting-up your webshop.  You will receive general conditions and a privacy policy (D/Fr/E/G) that can be adapted to your specific case, in dialog with an independent lawyer.  SafeShops keeps you informed about the ever changing legislation.  SafeShops Label enhances your consumer confidence.  All this for € 295/year.   European Label as a bonus SafeShops is accredited in Europe, you will also obtain the European Emota Label. This is a nice bonus for those eager to do business abroad.   Knowledge exchange in an accessible and open community SafeShops represents more than a Label.  Besides the open community with the label certification, our free SafeShops Café offers you interesting presentations from partners and other webshops.  You will also enjoy discounts on trainings, seminars and conferences.      Inclusive our 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights Safeshops also organizes yearly the 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights.  A campaign (radio and e-mail) where you can highlight your webshop during 7 nights and gather some extra attention.  All included in the certification cost. For more information please visit www.shoppingnight.be.

module.name: becommerce
module.description: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux. The BeCommerce Label demonstrates that your company complies with the BeCommerce Label Code and that your e-commerce site was certified by an independent organisation i.e. Bureau Veritas. With the BeCommerce Label members inform the consumer that they provide a reliable and secure way of online shopping.
module.additional_description: ​Advantages •        As a member you are allowed to display the BeCommerce Quality label. Research has demonstrated that the BeCommerce Quality label stands for reliability and safety. 83% of the consumers know/recognise the BeCommerce Quality label and 72% take the BeCommerce Quality label into account for online purchases. The BeCommerce Quality label provides consumers’ trust and contributes to higher conversion, therefore more turnover. •        BeCommerce manages the interests of the members by – among others – influencing the (new) law and regulations. It also regularly takes part in conversations with the various parties around the e-commerce market. •        With the membership and the BeCommerce Quality label, you show you comply with the law and regulations. You can apply the Terms & Conditions of BeCommerce. BeCommerce has the compliance of laws and regulations as single quality mark independently checked through the certification carried out by Bureau Veritas. This too increases the consumers’ trust in your online shop. •        You entitle the consumer to independent mediation, if you and the consumer have a dispute about the purchase. BeCommerce mediates with experienced solicitors and employees. This ensures very few complaints end up in a legal dispute. Should it go that far, BeCommerce is the only quality mark to provide independent dispute settlement. •        As a BeCommerce member you will enjoy knowledge and information share with other members. You receive free tests, white papers and publications, have access to the exclusive members network and you can participate in work groups (interest management). BeCommerce organises workshops and conventions in which you can participate and network free of charge or on a discount.

module.name: hipaymobileivr
module.description: Automated hotline service to simplify call management on your shop. Quickly integrate your free your hotline. Offer a dedicated phone number and get the best market conditions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Automated hotline service to simplify call management on your shop. Quickly integrate your free your hotline. Offer a dedicated phone number and get the best market conditions. ************ This service is available for Fance only ***********
module.additional_description: Simplify communication with your customers by providing a single contact numberInform or assist your clientsGenerate additional revenue with premium number optionAnalyze the behavior of callers and optimize your marketing campaigns

module.description: With Smart BID, concentrate on your strategy by using an automated bid management system, which is easily integrated into your exisitng AdWords campaigns to immediately boost ROI
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With Smart BID, concentrate on your strategy by using an automated bid management system, which is easily integrated into your exisitng AdWords campaigns to immediately boost ROI. (twenga)
module.additional_description: Traffic: Optimise the visibility of your products on Google AdWords Productivity: complete automation allows you to save time Instantly improve the ROI of your AdWords campaigns 30% improvement in ROI - Increase in traffic volume and profitability improved by an average of 30% Results in less than 10 days - Performance optimised in less than 10 days after activating the product Traffic increased by 80% Advanced user profiling and precise conversion prediction

module.name: twengafeed
module.displayName: Automation and optimisation of Google Shopping / Merchant Center campaigns
module.description: Completely automate your Google Shopping campaigns & improve your ROI by up to 40% in just a few days with Smart FEED by Twenga Solutions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Completely automate your Google Shopping campaigns & improve your ROI by up to 40% in just a few days with Smart FEED by Twenga Solutions.
module.additional_description: Traffic: Optimise the visibility of your products on Google's price comparison engine. Productivity: complete automation allows you to save time Unlock your Google Shopping performance with the most powerful automation solution 40% improvement in ROI Increase in traffic volume and profitability improved by an average of 40% Results in less than 10 days Performance optimised in less than 10 days after activating the product Traffic increased by 80% Advanced user profiling and precise conversion prediction

module.name: dhlparcelbelux
module.description: The DHL Parcel shipping module allows you to integrate different delivery options into the checkout of your web shop, so your customers can choose their preferred delivery method: home delivery (Benel
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The DHL Parcel shipping module allows you to integrate different delivery options into the checkout of your web shop, so your customers can choose their preferred delivery method: home delivery (Benelux and rest of Europe)delivery in a DHL Parcelshop (Benelux only)For home deliveries in the Benelux you can offer your customers further delivery options: no neighbour deliveryevening delivery (Tuesday to Thursday)Saturday delivery.  The DHL Parcel shipping module is free of charge, but you will need a DHL Parcel account to get access to our services.
module.additional_description: Increase your conversion rate by letting your customers choose where and when they want to have their shipment delivered: at a DHL Parcelshop or at home, during the day, in the evening or on Saturday. You decide which delivery options you want to offer your customers.   DHL Parcel has a dense network of DHL Parcelshops with extended opening hours, even during the weekend. At present there are 2300 DHL Parcelshops in the Benelux, 1100 of which are situated in Belgium. Furthermore DHL Parcel offers evening and Saturday deliveries within the whole Benelux territory.
